comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on May 18, 2023, 02:05:34 PMBonus terms? The Bonus Terms are the same as all general bonuses:-Rollover requirement x25-Minimum Sports odds: 1.45 Decimal-Bonus expires 7 days after recieving the bonus. Players can request an extension, within 24 hours of expiration datePlease email support@4cryptobet.net if you have any more questions.
